about.header: I am Carlos Hernandez, full stack web developer from Houston, Texas. I'm currently sharpening my skills and learning lots of new technologies.
about.reason: The first time I saw a computer was when I was in the 5th grade. It was the coolest thing ever. I pressed a key in the keyboard and it appeared on the monitor.
about.why: From the first line of code to last project I worked on as well as new technologies to new best practices; there's always something more for me to learn. That's what I love the most about being a developer!

projects.name: Show Finder
projects.tech_stack: Front End - React.js, Typescript and Scss
projects.description: Source through any movie or show in mind and learn more about your favorite series

projects.name: Doctor Website
projects.description: Doctors and patients can communicate with each other via a web platform. Through the platform, users can schedule real world visits for simple check ups or last minute care without the hassle of long call times

projects.name: School Calendar
projects.tech_stack: Full Stack - React in the front end, Node.js (MySql3) in the backend
projects.description: School teacher and coaches can schedule real world events to school events so that everyone is always updated when changes occur.
